author: Dailymail.Com Reporter
title: CeeLo Green wears gold emsemble with a mask at the Grammys | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad Meet Gnarly Davidson! Singer CeeLo Green wears all-in-one gold ensemble with a very creepy MASK as he dresses up as bizarre alter ego on the Grammy Awards red carpet The 42-year-old turned up at the prestigious event in what looked like a villain costume from a superhero movie CeeLo's gold ensemble even featured a full face mask, which he kept on the entire time he was on the red carpet At an event held on the previous night, CeeLo wore a similar ensemble, this time in a darker grey color, with a chameleon-effect face mask Published: 02:03 GMT, 13 February 2017 | Updated: 11:03 GMT, 13 February 2017 89 shares
